Name: Omar Al Darweez
BioText: Omar Al-Dariwis is a noble Quran reciter of Saudi nationality and origin, born in Al-Ahsa Governorate, Saudi Arabia. He is a university student at the College of Sharia. The reader Omar works as the imam of the Muslim Mosque in Al-Naseem neighborhood in Hofuf. Where he appeared in many videos while reciting the Qurâ€™an, which caused a sensation in the media, as a result of which major readers were paid to praise him, led by the famous reciter Nasser Al-Qatami, and it is worth noting that he was invited to open many major forums in Al-Ahsa and the eastern region in his melodious voice
